name: Magnus Fulgeo Demo
description:
This is my first ever game with RPG Maker MV. This game is still in development and may have typos and such, but the game is playable.  Join my discord for updates on the game, or if you wish to be part of the team, right now its just me and it is pretty tedious work. If you truly like the content and wish to see more, please consider donating as it helps me to continue my dream as a game developer and content creator. Once the game is final I will be uploading the game here and on mobile platforms.

Discord Server : https://discord.gg/kGRzAqAqnm

02/14/2021- Fixed a SE Error that would appear when loading the game, and fixed issue that had people start in the middle of the demo.
